div.p: NARRATOR: For the next few minutes, we will look at examples of some of the experiences that can drive the Spiral. After seeing a video example, you will be shown this screen, and asked to select which experience that example illustrates.
NARRATOR: Notice what happens to the picture of drug and alcohol-related problems in the center of the screen as you identify the different experiences of the Spiral.
NARRATOR: Ready to begin? Click Next to play the first example. Then, you'll be asked to identify which component of the Spiral that example represents best.
